products.title: Legacy Zinc Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The legacy blind is a beautiful, elegant and modern textured fabric which is available in a range of soft colours. A light filtering fabric ensures complete privacy without completly blocking out the light. A true mid grey shade, this blind is great way to add depth and interest to your window dressing. Product id: sdb-vtb1420 fabric colour: zinc grey material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes legacy zinc grey 89mm vertical blind in grey.
